Published since September 1843 to take part in "a severe contest between intelligence, which presses forward, and an unworthy, timid ignorance obstructing our progress."

April 13th-19th 2019.

The Economist  为你, 千千万万遍

Changelog

2017

  • June 14 - Add instantclick.js to speed up website by preloading links.

  • Apr 02 - Replace duoshuo comment with typecho.

  • Mar 11 - Add clipboard.js - Modern copy to clipboard.

  • Mar 04 - Add a color bar at the top of the page.

  • Feb 10 - Host Google Fonts locally.

  • Jan 21 - Serve static files such as images, css files, and javascript files in upyun.

  • Jan 09 - Fix some bugs.

2016

  • Dec 12 - Add nprogress to show the loading state of the pages with a slim progress bar at the top side.

  • Nov 28 - Add code-prettify to make source-code snippets in HTML prettier.

  • Nov 25 - Add a back-to-top icon at the bottom right corner.

  • Nov 19 - Add emojify.js to convert Emoji keywords to images.

  • Oct 6 - Show detailed type of web browser and operating system using UAParser.js.

  • Oct 2 - Add Share Buttons.

  • Oct 1 - Add IcoMoon - pixel perfect icon solutions.

  • Sept 13 - Add the Github logo to site header, and change color to blue when hovering over it.

  • Sept 11 - Build a xmuGoogle map using Google Maps API.

  • Sept 10 - Add qTip2. The second generation of the advanced qTip plugin for the ever popular jQuery framework.

  • Sept 8 - Add PhotoSwipe - a JavaScript image gallery for mobile and desktop.

  • Sept 5 - Build the full-text search engine using lunr.js.

  • Aug 15 - Add Fon Awesome.

  • Aug 13 - Add Google Analytics.

  • Aug 9 - My Jekyll blog launched, which is hosted on Github Pages.
